title: The Dynamic atmosphere
creator_credit: Roger Seccombe, S.T. Evans and CSIRO
brief_description: This film shows how the technicians and scientists of CSIRO measures aspects of the atmosphere. This includes experiments on “rotational” effects and their relevance to climatic disturbances. It shows the influence of cloud types on solar and infra-red radiation streams, and features an explanation of the ozone layer. Narrated by Keith Livingstone.
